articles.title: Coronavirus weekly: balancing a 'new normal' while keeping COVID-19 in check - The Conversation AU
articles.description: Our experts mull what it will take to keep people healthy, whether there should be optimism for a vaccine and how to fight lockdown fatigue.
articles.content:
As lockdowns are lifted and loosened, policymakers and experts are debating how to avoid a new surge in cases. Can we return to schools, restaurants and the office while keeping the coronavirus at bay?
